title: Night Of The Raven DVDRip (A The Crow-fanedit)
description:
what kind of fanedit (true fanedit = TF, extended edition = EE, special collection & preservation = SP): TF (Short Movie)
tagline: Revenge CAN be taken in haste
original film name: The Crow
new film name : Night of the Raven
film studio name : Dimension Films
edit crew name : Messenjah14
Date Original Film Was Released : 1994
Date Edit Was Released : 2008
Original Runtime : 98 min
New Runtime : 32 min
Amount of time Cut/Added : 66 minutes
Cuts removed/added/extended :
- Most flashbacks cut.
- All of the main bad guy aside from his part in killing Skank, has been removed.
- No chinese chick apart from the scene mentioned above.
- No Ernie Hudson.
- No Sarah.
- Removed almost all scenes aside from Eric&#039;s resurrection, the makeup scenes, the scenes where he kills the gang members, and Shelly&#039;s return.
- Custom credits.
- I used my previous edit of the movie, De-Colorized, as it&#039;s base, so it&#039;s mostly black and white.
- All scenes have been re-arranged chronolorgically.
Fanedit details (please add here details about DVD contents as well as video and audio information): The DVD will have 5.1 audio, scene selection and english&Finnish subtitles.
Your intention for this fanedit: Present this movie in a brand new way.
Your way to achieve your intention: Cut away A LOT of stuff. Doing so, I accidentally created something that could actually be called an arthouse movie I guess.
Hardware and software information (what did you use to create your fanedit): Womble, DVD Lab Pro 2, AutoGK
Additional Comment: It seems crappy, but give it a chance.
Time needed for the edition: 2 days
persons involved: Messenjah14
Additional information links: -
